name: The Life of a Magical Circle
name_original: The Life of a Magical Circle
description:
A free demo is now available, download and play it above!

The Life of a Magical Circle is a narrated roguelite in which you dodge obstacles and pick up circles. Some of the circles are part of your goal, but some of them are just for fun. It's up to you to figure out which is which and to try to stay focused.

You know how we all have a dream we want to follow, but it's more fun to watch Netflix and play video games instead? This is a game about that.

Features:

  • Control a magical circle and swim through its world with the fluid movement of your mouse
  • Dodge increasingly difficult obstacles
  • Pick up small circles that will either help you fulfill your purpose, or distract you and change the gameplay in strange and fun ways
  • A curious and philosophical narrator will observe you, react to your choices, reflect upon his own life, and wonder aloud about the nature of chasing one's dreams
  • Gaze upon a beautiful, evolving, fractal-based background
  • Listen to a fantastic soundtrack that you contribute to musically through your actions
  • 30 minutes to 3 hours long depending on your skill level, how wise you are, and how much you want to see
